summary: ACCORDING TO THIS WEBSITE AS WELL AS ALL OTHER SOURCES, MY 2004 HONDA ACCORD COUPE SHOULD HAVE A TAKATA AIRBAG, BUT I HAVE NOT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE, AND THIS SITE DOES NOT SHOW MY CAR ARE BEING RECALLED.  WHY IS MY CAR NOT RECALLED?  I AM VERY CONCERNED ABOUT MY FAMILY'S SAFETY WHEN DRIVE MY CAR.
